en.mnu_controls_desc: To interact with elements of the game world, use the left mouse button, or the touch screen if applicable. The entire game is controlled through left mouse click/touch interaction.
en.sve_msg_prompt: Would you like to save and continue the game, or save and quit the game?
en.mmu_msg_prompt: Would you like to return to the title screen? You will lose all unsaved progress.
en.btl_msg_mve_moveCritical: The move hit, and it did critical damage!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveNoEnergy: {0} does not have enough energy to use their move!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveNoEnergy_alt00: The player does not have enough energy to use their move!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveNoEnergy_alt01: The opponent does not have enough energy to use their move!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatInc_alt00: The move increased one of the player's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatInc_alt01: The move increased one of the opponent's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatDec_alt00: The move decreased one of the player's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatDec_alt01: The move decreased one of the opponent's stats!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatHigh_alt00: The player's stat can't go any higher!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatHigh_alt01: The opponent's stat can't go any higher!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatLow_alt00: The player's stat can't go any lower!
en.btl_msg_mve_moveStatLow_alt01: The opponent's stat can't go any lower!
en.btl_msg_mve_runFailed_alt00: The player failed to run away!
en.btl_msg_mve_runFailed_alt01: The opponent failed to run away!
en.btl_msg_paralyzed_alt00: The player is immobilized, and can't move!
en.btl_msg_paralyzed_alt01: The opponent is immobilized, and can't move!
en.btl_msg_battleWon: The opponent ran away! The player has won the battle!
en.btl_msg_battleWonBoss: The boss ran away! The player has completed the simulation!
en.btl_msg_battleLost: The player lost the battle, and had to run away!
en.btl_msg_treasure: There is treasure in this room. Do you want to take it now?
en.btl_msg_takeTreasure: The player has taken the treasure!
en.btl_msg_levelUp: The player got a level up!
en.btl_msg_learnMove: The player is trying to learn a new move!
en.btl_msg_learnMoveYes_alt: The player learned the new move!
en.btl_msg_learnMoveNo_alt: The player did not learn the new move.
en.mve_run_dsc: The user attempts to run away. There is a 0.50 chance of success.
en.mve_charge_dsc: The user charges their energy by 40%.
en.mve_poke_dsc: An attack that has a 0.40 critical damage chance, and a 0.05 chance of raising the user's defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_slimeShot_dsc: An attack that has a 0.15 chance of lowering the target's speed by 1 stage.
en.mve_fireShot_dsc: A weak fire attack with a burn chance of 0.10.
en.mve_elecShot_dsc: A weak electric attack with a paralysis chance of 0.10.
en.mve_screech_dsc: A weak attack that has a 0.15 chance of lowering the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_slam_dsc: An attack that has a critical damage chance of 0.60.
en.mve_chip_dsc: A weak attack that always goes first.
en.mve_toss_dsc: An attack that has a 0.10 chance of lowering the target's attack by 1 stage.
en.mve_magnify_dsc: The user raises their accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_heal_dsc: The user heals 20% of their health.
en.mve_hpDrain1_dsc: The user attacks the target, and restores their health by 12.5% of the damage given.
en.mve_healthSplit_dsc: The user and the target add together their proportional health, then split said health evenly between themselves.
en.mve_pushBack_dsc: The user pushes the target back, which has a 0.20 chance of increasing the user's defense.
en.mve_fireBurst_dsc: A decent fire attack that has a 0.20 chance of burning the target.
en.mve_elecBurst_dsc: A decent electric attack that has a 0.20 chance of paralyzing the target.
en.mve_soundWave_dsc: A decent attack that has a 0.20 chance of lowering the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_magnet_dsc: The user increases their accuracy by 2 stages, and the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_torch_dsc: A weak attack that always burns the target.
en.mve_electrify_dsc: A weak attack that always paralyzes the target.
en.mve_motivate_dsc: The user increases their attack, defense, and speed by 1 stage each. This move will always go last.
en.mve_quickBurst_dsc: The user does a quick move that always goes first. This move will deal 0.15 of the damage dealt back to the user.
en.mve_hpDrain2_dsc: The user attacks the target, gaining 25% of the damage dealt as health.
en.mve_statClear_dsc: The user resets all stat changes for themselves and their opponent.
en.mve_cure_dsc: The user removes all their status ailments.
en.mve_risk_dsc: The user increases their attack by 2 stages and accuracy by 1 stage, but lowers their defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_tidalWave_dsc: The user hits the target with a strong attack that never misses.
en.mve_wham_dsc: The user hits the target with a decent, basic attack.
en.mve_fireBlast_dsc: A strong fire blast with a 0.30 chance of burning the target.
en.mve_elecBlast_dsc: A strong electric blast with a 0.30 chance of paralyzing the target.
en.mve_sonicWave_dsc: A strong attack that has a 0.25 chance of lowering the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
en.mve_hpDrain3_dsc: The user attacks the target, gaining 40% of the damage dealt as health.
en.mve_twister_dsc: The user attacks the target, lowering the target's defense by 1 stage. This move cannot do critical damage.
en.mve_waterBlast_dsc: The user attacks the target. This move has a 0.30 chance of lowering the target's attack by 1 stage.
en.mve_rockBlast_dsc: The user attacks the target. This move has a 0.30 chance of lowering the target's defense by 1 stage.
en.mve_airBlast_dsc: The user attacks the target. This move has a 0.30 of lowering the target's speed by 1 stage.
en.mve_quake_dsc: The user hits the target with a strong move. The move has a critical chance of 0.30, and deals 40% of the damage dealt back to the user.
en.mve_chargeSun_dsc: A move that uses all the user's energy. The more energy used, the stronger the move. This move has a burn chance of 0.20, and always goes last.
en.mve_chargeMoon_dsc: A move that uses all the user's energy. The more energy used, the stronger the move. This move has a paralysis chance of 0.20, and always goes last.
en.mve_earlyBurst_dsc: A move that gets weaker the longer the battle goes on.
en.mve_allOut_dsc: A move that lowers the user's attack stat by 1 stage every time it's used.
en.switchMoveMessage: Switch out for a new move?
en.que01: When 2 battlers have the same speed, the turn order is perfectly random. If the player has the same speed as their opponent, what is the chance of the player going first?
en.que02: If a move does not mention that it can burn the target, the burn chance is 0.00. What does this mean?
en.que02_res00: The move cannot inflict burn status on the target.
en.que02_res01: The move always inflicts burn status on the target.
en.que02_res02: The move might inflict burn status on the target.
en.que02_res03: The target is immune to being burned.
en.que03: If a move mentions that it can paralyze the target, the paralysis chance is greater than 0.00. If the paralysis chance is set to 1.00, what does this mean?
en.que03_res00: The target is immune to paralysis status.
en.que03_res01: The move will never inflict paralysis status.
en.que03_res02: The move will inflict paralysis status half of the time.
en.que03_res03: The move will always inflict paralysis status.
en.que04: Move A has a power of 40 and an accuracy of 1.00. Move B has a power of 60 and an accuracy of 0.90. What is true about Move A and Move B?
en.que04_res00: Move A is stronger than Move B, but it is less accurate.
en.que04_res01: Move A is stronger than Move B, and it is more accurate.
en.que04_res02: Move A is weaker than Move B, and it is less accurate.
en.que04_res03: Move A is weaker than Move B, but it is more accurate.
en.que05: The opponent has 65% of their health, and 3 of their 4 battle moves can restore their health. Assuming the opponent will not charge their energy, and that each move has an equal chance of being chosen, what is the chance that the opponent will use a healing move?
en.que06: The player uses a move that raises their accuracy by 2 stages. Which of the following statements is true?
en.que06_res00: The player will move faster than they did before.
en.que06_res01: The player's attacks will do more damage.
en.que06_res02: The player's moves are more likely to hit their target.
en.que06_res03: The opponent's moves will do less damage to the player.
en.que07: The player is hit by a move that lowers their accuracy by 1 stage. Which of the following statements is true?
en.que07_res00: The player's moves are now less likely to hit their target.
en.que07_res01: The player will move slower than they did before.
en.que07_res02: The player will take more damage from their opponent.
en.que07_res03: The player's attacks will do less damage
en.que08: The opponent has 20% of their energy left. Along with the charge move, the opponent has 1 other move that they can use. Assuming each move has an equal chance of being chosen, how likely is it that the opponent will choose the charge move?
en.que09: Move A has a power of 70 and an accuracy of 0.95. Move B has a power of 80 and an accuracy of 0.85. If the user is prioritizing moves with high accuracy, should they pick Move B over Move A?
en.que10: Move A has a power of 90 and an accuracy of 0.80. Move B has a power of 100 and an accuracy of 0.75. If the user is prioritizing moves with high accuracy, which move would they pick?
en.que11: Move A has a 0.40 chance of burning the target, Move B has a 0.25 chance of burning the target, and Move C always burns the target. If the user wants to burn their opponent, which move has the best chance of doing so?
en.que12: Move A has a 0.30 chance of burning the target, Move B has a 0.10 chance of burning the target, and Move C has a 0.60 chance of burning the target. If the user wants to burn their opponent, which move has the worst chance of doing so?
en.que13: Move A has an accuracy of 0.85 and a paralysis chance of 0.45. Move B has an accuracy of 0.95 and a paralysis chance of 0.30. Move C has an accuracy of 0.70 and a paralysis chance of 0.60. Which move has the lowest chance of paralyzing the target if it hits?
en.que14: The player has 3 moves: Move A, Move B, and Move C. Move A has an accuracy of 0.90, Move B has an accuracy of 0.80, and Move C has an accuracy of 1.00. If the player is hit by a move that reduces their accuracy, which move has a 1.00 chance of hitting its target?
en.que14_res03: None of the 3 moves have a 1.00 chance of hitting their target.
en.que15: Move A has an accuracy of 1.00, Move B has an accuracy of 0.95, and Move C has an accuracy of 0.90. If the user's accuracy is increased by 0.05, which moves will always hit their target?
en.que15_res03: All 3 moves are guaranteed to hit their target.
en.que16: Move A has a 0.25 chance of burning the target, Move B has a 0.30 chance of paralyzing the target, and Move C has a 0.50 chance of causing critical damage. Which event is most likely to occur?
en.que16_res02: Move C getting a critical damage bonus on the target.
en.que17: Move A has an accuracy of 0.70, Move B has an accuracy of 0.85, and Move C has an accuracy of 0.90. If all 3 moves are powerful enough to defeat the opponent in one turn, which move is the riskiest option?
en.que17_res03: All 3 moves are equally as risky.
en.que18: The opponent has 4 moves: Move A, Move B, Move C, and Move D. Move A's accuracy is 0.90, Move B's accuracy is 0.70, Move C's accuracy is 1.00, and Move D's accuracy is 0.85. Which move is least likely to hit the player?
en.que19: Move A has a 0.40 chance of raising the user's attack, Move B has a 0.30 chance of raising the user's defense, and Move C has a 0.20 chance of raising the user's speed. If the user's attack stat cannot go any higher, which move effect has the highest chance of occurring?
en.que19_res00: Move A increasing the user's attack stat.
en.que19_res01: Move B increasing the user's defense stat.
en.que19_res02: Move C increasing the user's speed stat.
en.que19_res03: All move effects have an equal chance of occurring.
en.que20: Move A has a 0.40 chance of raising the user's attack, Move B has a 0.60 chance of raising the user's defense, and Move C has a 0.20 chance of raising the user's speed. If the user's defense cannot go any lower, which move effect has the highest chance of occurring?
en.que20_res00: Move A raising the user's attack.
en.que20_res01: Move B raising the user's defense.
en.que20_res02: Move C raising the user's speed.
en.que20_res03: The events all have the same chance of occurring.
en.que21: There are 10 doors remaining, and 2 of them are treasure doors. If every door has an equal chance of being chosen, what is the chance of the player choosing a treasure door?
en.que22: There are 5 doors remaining, and 1 of them is a treasure door. If every door has an equal chance of being chosen, what is the chance of a non-treasure door being chosen?
en.que23: Enemy A is behind 1/12 doors, Enemy B is behind 3/12 doors, Enemy C is behind 6/12 doors, and Enemy D is behind 2/12 doors. If every door has an equal chance of being chosen, which enemy will the player most likely encounter next?
en.que24: Enemy A is behind 4/14 doors, Enemy B is behind 5/14 doors, Enemy C is behind 3/14 doors, and Enemy D is behind 2/14 doors. If every door has an equal chance of being chosen, which enemy is least likely to be encountered next by the player?
en.que25: Move A has a critical damage chance of 0.40. If the player gets the critical damage bonus, they will win the battle in 1 turn. If the player doesn't get the critical damage bonus, they will win the battle in 2 turns. What is the chance of the player winning the battle in 2 turns?
en.trl_intro_00: Before we begin, here's a quick tip. Pressing the forward button while the text is scrolling will automatically show the rest of the text for the current page.
en.trl_intro_01: Once all the page text is displayed, the forward button will move onto the next page, or close the textbox if there are no more pages. Now, with all that out of the wayâ€¦
en.trl_intro_02: Welcome to the battle simulator, Battle Bot! Your job is to beat the boss of this simulation, who is behind the red door. But first, there are some things you should know about the simulation.
en.trl_intro_03: This is the overworld, which is where you pick a door to go through. Once you win your first battle, all regular doors will be unlocked. The boss room is only unlocked after you complete all other rooms.
en.trl_intro_04: In addition, you will occasionally be given a question after you complete a room and return to the overworld. These questions serve to test your understanding of different probability concepts.
en.trl_intro_05: To the left is your health, and to the right is your energy. These will be explained further once you get into a battle.
en.trl_intro_06: At the bottom is your current score, which increases every time you clear a room. The number of points given for clearing a room is based on how well you did at completing said room.
en.trl_intro_07: Your score also increases when you answer a question correctly. The faster you answer a question, the more points that are rewarded if said answer is correct.
en.trl_intro_08: And finally, at the top is the round number, as well as various options that you can select. Notably, some of the options up top get disabled depending on the state of the game.
en.trl_intro_09: With all that explained, please select one of the open doors to attempt your first battle!
en.trl_battle_00: Welcome to your first battle, Battle Bot!
en.trl_battle_01: To successfully win a battle, you must bring your opponent's health down to 0. If your health hits 0, you will lose the battle and get a game over.
en.trl_battle_02: You can hold up to 4 regular moves at a time, which together with the charge and run moves makes for a total of 6 battle options max.
en.trl_battle_03: Selecting the run move has you attempt to flee from the battle, which always has a 0.50 chance of success. If you succeed, you will return to the overworld.
en.trl_battle_04: Enemies retain their health and energy levels if you flee, but they will be completely restored if too many rooms are completed without finishing their battles. More on this later.
en.trl_battle_05: Since this is the tutorial battle, the run option has been disabled. After this battle ends, the run option will always be available, even when battling the boss of the simulation.
en.trl_battle_06: The charge move is used to charge your energy, which it restores by a fixed amount. Regular moves take energy to perform, so they cannot be used without enough energy.
en.trl_battle_07: Speaking of which, regular moves all have different characteristics that determine how well they perform in battle. To view your full move information, check the stats window.
en.trl_battle_08: As for the move buttons, they show the move names, and the current accuracy of every move. If you don't have enough energy to perform a move, the move's button will be disabled.
en.trl_battle_09: That's all for now, so on with the battle!
en.trl_firstMove_00: You just completed your first turn of battle! Now that you've experienced how the battles work, some more move elements will be explained.
en.trl_firstMove_01: A move's rank determines how advanced the move is, and it ranges from 1 to 3. The higher the number, the higher the rank. High rank move offers will become more common the further you get into the game.
en.trl_firstMove_02: A move's power determines how strong the move is. If a move doesn't have a power amount listed, then it either does no damage, or determines damage in a different way than usual.
en.trl_firstMove_03: A move's accuracy determines how likely it is to hit its target. A move with no accuracy listed either always succeeds or has its success rate determined by a different factor than usual.
en.trl_firstMove_04: A move's energy level determines what percentage of the battler's energy is used to perform the move. If a move's energy usage isn't listed, then it either uses no energy, or its energy usage varies.
en.trl_firstMove_05: Make sure to open the stats window if you ever want to see any of the information mentioned for one of your moves.
en.trl_firstMove_06: That's all for the move explanations, so on with the battle!
en.trl_critical_01: Critical damage is a damage bonus that has a chance of being applied for every directly damaging move.
en.trl_critical_02: Unless the move description states otherwise, every directly damaging move has the same chance of getting the critical bonus.
en.trl_recoil_01: Recoil damage is damage done to the user for successfully performing their move.
en.trl_recoil_02: A move's description will state if it does recoil damage.
en.trl_statChange_00: You have encountered a stat change!
en.trl_statChange_01: Some moves can increase or decrease a battler's stats, with said changes being in effect for the rest of the battle unless stated otherwise.
en.trl_statChange_02: Completing or fleeing from a battle will remove all stat changes for both you and your opponent.
en.trl_burn_01: Damage will be taken each turn when inflicted with burn status.
en.trl_burn_02: Burn status wears off if you win the battle, or if you run away from the battle. This goes for you and your opponent.
en.trl_paralysis_00: You have encountered the paralysis status!
en.trl_paralysis_01: When inflicted with paralysis, a battler will move slower and has a chance of skipping a turn.
en.trl_paralysis_02: Paralysis status wears off if you win the battle, or if you run away from the battle. This goes for you and your opponent.
en.trl_firstBattleDeath_00: Since this is your first battle, the simulation has completely restored your health and energy.
en.trl_firstBattleDeath_01: Keep in mind that this is a one-time thing. If you lose all your health after this battle is over, you will get a game over.
en.trl_overworld_00: Now that you've tried out a battle, all the other doors are unlocked, except for the boss room.
en.trl_overworld_01: As mentioned before, the game ends when you beat the boss, who can only be challenged after all the other rooms are cleared.
en.trl_overworld_02: You'll get stronger and learn better moves the more rooms that you clear, so how you approach this task is up to you.
en.trl_overworld_03: As for the enemies, they will get stronger as the game progresses, and some can evolve into different forms. If an enemy can evolve, it will happen when a phase change occurs.
en.trl_overworld_04: A phase change happens when you complete enough rooms, with there being three phases in total. A phase change is signified by a change in the game background, and in the game music.
en.trl_overworld_05: Enemies regain all their health and energy when a phase change occurs, even if they don't evolve. Each phase has an equal number of doors, so keep that in mind if you leave any battles unfinished.
en.trl_overworld_06: Also remember that running away from battle is always an option, even against the final boss.
en.trl_overworld_07: Going back to phases, you get permanent stat boosts when the phase changes, but your current health and energy levels stay the same. The stats screen reflects these changes as usual.
en.trl_overworld_08: Since you're currently in the first phase, you have two phase stat boosts left to get.
en.trl_overworld_09: That's all for now, so on with the game!
en.trl_treasure_01: If you take the treasure, you get a free level up, some health restored, some energy restored, and an opportunity to learn a new move.
en.trl_treasure_02: If you don't take the treasure, the room will remain open, so you can always pick up the treasure later.
en.trl_boss_01: All you need to do is beat the boss to win the game! Good luck!
en.trl_gameOver_00: You lost the battle and got a game over, so there's some things that you should know.
en.trl_gameOver_01: Once a room is completed, it will stay completed no matter what. So, you don't have to redo any rooms you already cleared. The open doors have had their positions randomized though.
en.trl_gameOver_02: As for the enemies, they have all had their health and energy fully restored. However, the enemies themselves and their moves have not changed.
en.trl_gameOver_03: And as for you, your health and energy have been completely restored, but some of your moves have been randomized. Make sure to check the stats window to see your new moves.
en.trl_gameOver_04: That's all for now, so good luck!
